message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a unique opportunity to own a one-of-a-kind item that will bring you a lot of value. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12,000.
I appreciate the offer, Alice.  However, I'm looking to spend a bit less than that. Would you be willing to do $9,500?  I'm very interested in the product and think this price is fair for both of us.

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $11,000. This is a fair price considering the value it will bring to you, and it's a compromise from my initial offer.
